New Records: Cole Ragans scattered four hits in six scoreless innings.
Michael Massey had three hits, including a home run.
Cole Ragans became the fifth Royals pitcher to reach 200 strikeouts in a season since Zack Greinke in 2009.
The Royals moved into a half-game lead for second place in the AL Central and the second wild card spot.
Key Match Events: The Royals scored a run in the third inning with a walk and a sacrifice fly.
Michael Massey extended the lead with a solo home run in the fourth inning.
The Royals used their speed to add runs in the fifth inning with stolen bases and singles.
Yuli Gurriel's sacrifice fly in the eighth inning scored the final run.
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals traded places with the Twins in the AL Central and wild card standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins and Royals will play the second game of their three-game series.
The Royals' Renfroe was returned from the 10-day Injured List, and corresponding moves were made.
